Public sector cuts: PSA union slams Government for Internal Affairs downsize https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/public-sector-cuts-psa-union-slams-government-for-internal-affairs-downsize/XCHZIFFQG5ESVCKMTXPZFZ64FM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/public-sector-cuts-psa-union-slams-government-for-internal-affairs-downsize/XCHZIFFQG5ESVCKMTXPZFZ64FM/ Raphael FranksOver 6000 jobs have been cut across civil service as part of Govt-requested cost savings. Wed, 19 Jun 2024 03:49:16 +0000 The PSA called the cuts at the Department of Internal Affairs (DIA) “reckless and disturbing” and questioned why digital safety teams would be slimmed down given the DIA had advised its minister last November of the concerning rise in objectionable content online.
